# predict.codes — Programming & Tech Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for programming & tech. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.codes is a prediction market platform focused on programming & tech. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Programming & Tech prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.codes)
- [Markets — Active programming & tech prediction markets](https://predict.codes#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, programming & tech, betting, odds, forecast, predict.codes
